lines.text: The winner and new owner of the Coliseum, Mr. Tommy Lee! Say a few words, champ.
The Coliseum is closed.

[Tommy Lee's house explodes with Gus inside]
I always told Gus smoking would kill him.
[breaks into laughter]
[talking about the Coliseum gladiators]
They kill their own mothers! Mean as catshit! Run over nuns!
Did you kill Travis Brickley?
Easily.
I don't fight drunks.
Drunk? This is nothing. Right here.
[Taps chin]
Give me your best shot. I'll rip your fuckin' ears right off your god damn head. Then I'll stick 'em right where the sun don't shine, so you can hear me kick your butt!
Are you gonna help Tommy?
Sure. I'll help him. Be my pleasure to help the boy.

[hands her a dollar]
Here. Give him that for a bowl of soup.

I know what happened to you, and what you think it cost you. But the son who left me many moons ago in search of his manhood came back to me a drunken, self pitying, overgrown child. You are a terrible example for our people and a disgrace to your mother. You have an opportunity now to do some good.
[begins walking away, then turns to him]
Help Tommy or pack your bags.
You seem to have a very big mouth!
And a big everything else!

[as Brakus' guards approach Alex and Dae Han]
You ready to get your clothes dirty?
What about you?
It's a rental.
